entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Roblin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roblin 9:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -26.5°C
Wind: NW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 28.
